1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Attributes of relmap operator.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Attr
8  ( -- * Attribute layout
9    AttrParaSpec,
10    AttrLayout (..),
11    AttrBranch (..),
12    attrBranch,
13  
14    -- * Attribute parameter
15    AttrPara, AttrParaze,
16    attrPara, attrParaBy,
17    maybeSingleHyphen,
18    maybeDoubleHyphen,
19  ) where
20
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Para           as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree          as S
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.AttrName  as S
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Message   as Msg
26
27
28-- ----------------------  Attribute layout
29
30-- | Parameter specification for attribute name.
31type AttrParaSpec = S.ParaSpec S.AttrName
32
33-- | Attribute layout.
34data AttrLayout = AttrLayout [(Maybe String, AttrBranch)]
35                  deriving (Show)
36
37-- | Single layout.
38data AttrBranch = AttrBranch
39    { attrParaSpec    :: AttrParaSpec       -- ^ Parameter specification
40    , attrClassifier  :: B.Map S.AttrName   -- ^ Attribute classifier
41    }
42
43instance Show AttrBranch where
44    show AttrBranch {..} = "AttrBranch (" ++ show attrParaSpec ++ ")"
45
46-- | Construct attribute branch.
47attrBranch :: AttrParaSpec -> AttrBranch
48attrBranch spec = AttrBranch spec $ attrClassify spec
49
50-- | Set type of attribute name.
51attrClassify :: AttrParaSpec -> B.Map S.AttrName
52attrClassify spec n = n' where
53    n' = case lookup (S.attrNameText n) pairs of
54           Just k  -> k
55           Nothing -> n
56
57    pairs   :: [(String, S.AttrName)]
58    pairs   = map pair $ S.paraSpecNames spec
59    pair k  = (S.attrNameText k, k)
60
61
62-- ----------------------  Attribute sorter
63
64-- | Attribute parameter.
65type AttrPara = S.Para S.AttrName S.TTree
66
67-- | Parameterizer for attribute of relmap operator.
68type AttrParaze = [S.TTree] -> B.Ab AttrPara
69
70-- | Parameterize named attributes.
71attrPara :: AttrParaze
72attrPara trees =
73    let p = S.para byHyphen trees
74    in Right $ S.paraNameAdd S.attrNameTrunk (S.paraPos p) p
75
76-- | Parameterize attributes by its layout.
77attrParaBy :: AttrLayout -> AttrParaze
78attrParaBy lay = attrPara B.>=> attrMatch lay
79
80-- | Match parameter with its layout.
81attrMatch :: AttrLayout -> B.AbMap AttrPara
82attrMatch (AttrLayout branches) p = loop [] branches where
83    loop us [] = Msg.unexpAttrMulti $ map (fmap S.attrNameCode) $ reverse us
84    loop us ((tag, b) : bs) =
85        case branch b of
86          Left u   -> loop (u:us) bs
87          Right p' -> case tag of
88                        Nothing -> Right p'
89                        Just t  -> Right $ p' { S.paraTags = t : S.paraTags p' }
90
91    branch (AttrBranch spec classify) =
92        S.paraMatch spec $ S.paraNameMapKeys classify p
93
94
95-- ----------------------  Name
96
97byHyphen :: S.TTreeTo (Maybe S.AttrName)
98byHyphen = fmap S.AttrNormal . maybeSingleHyphen
99
100-- | Take out hyphened text (like @"-x"@) from token tree.
101maybeSingleHyphen :: S.TTreeTo (Maybe String)
102maybeSingleHyphen (S.TextLeafAttr _ n)      = Just n
103maybeSingleHyphen _                         = Nothing
104
105-- | Take out double-hyphened text (like @"--xyz"@) from token tree.
106maybeDoubleHyphen :: S.TTreeTo (Maybe String)
107maybeDoubleHyphen (S.TextLeafAttr2 _ n)     = Just n
108maybeDoubleHyphen _                         = Nothing
109
